maze.logic

Class Eagle

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.Element
      • maze.logic.Moveable
        • maze.logic.Eagle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Eagle
extends Moveable
    Class that represents all "eagle" type objects. An eagle has the following atributes: - moving/movingHorizontally: both refer to flying movement; - flying: whether it is or not flying; - useful: whether it has or not some use (if the sword belong to the player already, then the eagle is of no use to the player).
    See Also:
    Moveable, Serialized Form

      • update

        public void update(GameLogic game)

        Parameters:
        game - : current GameLogic instance
